TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PointConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 将 对象从一种数据类型转换为另一种数据类型。

span.span: Converts a object from one data type to another.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类通常用于创建具有的类型的属性的控件的设计时体验，和用于将点转换为以在设计器中显示的字符串以及要转换到的设计器中输入的字符串对象。The class is typically used for creating a design-time experience for controls that have properties that are of type , and is used to convert points to strings for display in a designer and to convert strings entered in a designer to a object. 通过 对象访问此类。Access this class through the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和运算符。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and the operator. 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将此代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowPointConverter`方法时处理该窗体的事件，并传递`e`作为。Paste this code into a form and call the `ShowPointConverter` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Converters#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Converters/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Converters#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Converters/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Converters#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Converters/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context`参数可以用于获取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的其他信息。The `context` parameter can be used to get additional information about the environment this converter is being called from. 这可能为 `null`，因此应总是对其进行检查。This can be `null`, so you should always check. 同样，上下文对象上的属性也可能 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can also return `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常见的转换类型是与字符串对象的相互转换。The most common types to convert are to and from a string object. 默认实现调用对象的方法如果对象有效，且如果目标类型是字符串。The default implementation calls the object's method if the object is valid and if the destination type is string. 如果此方法无法转换为目标类型，此操作将引发异常。If this method cannot convert to the destination type, this will throw a exception.

span.span: The conversion cannot be completed.
